comments:
Hi

/Problem
I got this exception when trying to generated a java bean proxy for a web 
service but I do not understand where it comes from. Nowhere is references the 
XMLSchema.dtd in all schemas I am using.

What should I do for bypassing this exception??

Regards

FA



/Context:
java version "1.4.1_02"
Java(TM) 2 Runtime Environment, Standard Edition (build 1.4.1_02-b06)
Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (build 1.4.1_02-b06, mixed mode)

eclipse.buildId=I20050219-1500


/Exception
